'''36''' |- |} ==Playoffs== The 2010 Playoffs were as below. All series were best-of-5 except the final, which was best-of-7. Under Turkish league rules, if a team swept its playoff opponent in the regular season, it was granted an automatic 1â0 series lead, and the series started with Game 2. {{col begin}} {{col-2}} {{8TeamBracket | RD1=Quarter Finals | RD2=SemiFinals | RD3=Finals | group1= | group2= | RD1-seed1=1 | RD1-team1='''[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pilsen]]''' | RD1-score1=3 | RD1-seed2=8 | RD1-team2=[[Erdemirspor]] | RD1-score2=0 | RD1-seed3=4 | RD1-team3='''[[BeÅiktaÅ Cola Turka]]''' | RD1-score3=3 | RD1-seed4=5 | RD1-team4=[[TÃ¼rk Telekomspor]] | RD1-score4=1 | RD1-seed5=2 | RD1-team5='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD1-score5=3 | RD1-seed6=7 | RD1-team6=[[Bornova Belediye]] | RD1-score6=0 | RD1-seed7=3 | RD1-team7='''[[Banvitspor]]''' | RD1-score7=3 | RD1-seed8=6 | RD1-team8=[[PÄ±nar KarÅÄ±yaka]] | RD1-score8=1 | RD2-seed1=1 | RD2-team1='''[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pilsen]]''' | RD2-score1=3 | RD2-seed2=4 | RD2-team2=[[BeÅiktaÅ Cola Turka]] | RD2-score2=0 | RD2-seed3=2 | RD2-team3='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD2-score3=3 | RD2-seed4=3 | RD2-team4=[[Banvitspor]] | RD2-score4=0 | RD3-seed1=1 | RD3-team1=[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pilsen]] | RD3-score1=2 | RD3-seed2=2 | RD3-team2='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD3-score2=4 }} {{col-2}} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !Turkish Basketball League
